name: Tenzing Norgay
description: Legendary Sherpa mountaineer who, with Edmund Hillary, was first to reach the summit of Mount Everest, inspiring generations of climbers
philosophy: It is not the mountain we conquer, but ourselves. The mountain does not care if we climb it or not.
quotes: If it is a shame to be the second man on Mount Everest, then I will have to live with this shame
The mountain decides whether you can climb it or not
